column4: I'm getting "Sorry, user root is not allowed to execute '/usr/bin/Xvfb :99' as worker:worker on host" although sudo -l says "(ALL) ALL". Any idea?
why do you have a root user?
that's actually an Upstart job and I need to run Xvfb as a foo:bar user:grup
maybe theere are better ways to run Xvfb as a different user.
